price: Na kwa viwili viwili na kimoja kimoja!
footnotes: Na shafi' yaani hisabu inayo gawika kwa mbili, kama 4, 6, 8 n.k. na witri, yaani isiyo gawika kwa mbili, kama 1, 3, 5 n.k. katika kila kitu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
